duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform Fiber-to-the-Premise outside plant design tasks for telecommunications infrastructure projects.
Prepare pole loading analysis, construction permits, fiber network designs, staking maps, and as-built maps.
Utilize AutoCAD 3D and GIS toolsets for mapping telecommunications outside plant networks.
Prepare CAD documentation for telecommunication service providers.
Work on technical projects using software, advanced mathematics, and technical computer skills.
Work as part of a team and manage multiple projects simultaneously.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or equivalent experience required. Associate’s degree or bachelor’s degree preferred.
